text: Megalobrimus lettowvorbecki is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Richard Kriesche in 1923. It is known from Tanzania.BioLib.cz - Megalobrimus lettowvorbecki. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1923
title: Megalobrimus lettowvorbecki
